Low handicap golfer you have done quite well, but you also want to get rid of the last of those positive pole.Possession sophisticated surgerySome say that contemporary golf techniques emphasize strength, ball-handling skills obsolete. Do not be fooled by such things, the freedom to manipulate the trajectory of golf technology is still a crucial point, especially for those driving distance of less than 300 yards in terms of amateur golfers. In order to stop the ball in the corner near the flagpole, lower handicap, you must have the ability to make the ball fly from left to right, flying from right to left. In addition, the trajectory height control can also help you escape the wind and the trees. Here are some basics possession of this knowledge, you can make the white ball flight

with your mind.How to fly the ball to the left or rightTo play small ball or small left hook right hook, just adjust the grip and the station is not enough. The most important thing is to adjust the angle of the face when the ball. To play a small left hook, the face should be relative to the swing path is closed; want to play the right song small ball, the clubface should be open.First, in front of the body holding the club to play a small left hook, should make the clubface slightly rotated down (closed); want to play small ball the right song, you should make the clubface slightly upward towardchaussure air jordan 4 the sky turning (open). Then, the club face angle remains the same, to make you feel a natural grip action will be placed on the club face behind the ball to make it towards the goal. Next, make your body and when you want to start the ball parallel to the direction in which the flight. That is, to play a small left hook, the body should be pointing to the right target; want to play small right hook, pointing to the left side of the body should be the target.To play a small left hook, but also the ball position after the shift, the ball close to the alignment of the stations in the middle, so that when the ball is more likely to face toward the right of the target. To the right song to play small ball, the ball position should be forward, will be in the direction of the left goal line slant so when the ball started flying.How to make low-flying or fly ballSometimes, you have to make the ball from beneath drooping branches or through the wind. To play the low-flying ball, the ball should be aligned with the center of the rear of the station, this can reduce the effective loft. To play the low-flying ball, spin down your enemies. T

o reduce the rotation, flatter trajectory should be made closer to Rake swing. In operation the flow manipulation head held in a lower position, so that the ball can be reduced during the effective loft of further reduce trajectory.Conversely, if you want to hit a fly ball, such as the need overflying a tree, the ball should be aligned with the center of the front of the station, make more nearly vertical swing, hitting down, spin down and increase altitude.So that when the club fell apart in his hands and a higher position, this can increase the ball effectively in the process of loft, the ball fly, then gently landing.
